summary: The Department of Defense has been unable to accurately account for government property in its contractors' possession. Some of the $118.4 billion in general equipment the Air Force reported in FY 2024 was held by contractors. We traced a sample of these items held across 5 contractor facilities and in 3 systems of record. One of the systems didn't accurately account for this equipment. About...
title: DOD Financial Management: Air Force Needs to Properly Account for All General Equipment That Contractors Hold
